snippet.title: Kingdom Rush Vengeance Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Kingdom Rush Vengeance Official Trailer

Vez’nan, the powerful almighty wizard has returned!

Set out on an epic journey as you gather up an army to fulfill the dark lord devious plans as you march towards Linirea. Get ready to show the Kingdom who’s the real boss!

Fight your way as you conquer lands old and new. Unlock up to 16 deadly new towers and combine them to obliterate any who stand in your path!

Face empires of mighty enemies and clash against supreme bosses in this classic tower defense full of humor and epicness!

iOS http://ironhi.de/b/KRVAppSSM 
Android http://ironhi.de/b/KRVGPSM 

For more information visit Kingdom Rush Vengeance website: https://www.kingdomrushvengeance.com/
